Package deck

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • deck.Deck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharacterDeck
    public abstract class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    It is the super type to manage several deck.Deck type: deck.CharacterDeck, DangerousSectorDeck, EscapeHatchDeck and ItemDeck.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected Deck()
      Construct a deck.Deck without initializing any attributes.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void addCard​(Card card)
      addCard allows to add a deck.Card to the cardList of a certain deck.Deck.
      void deckShuffle()
      deckSuffle allows to shuffle the cardList of a certain deck.Deck.
      void discardCard​(Card card)
      discardCard allows to put a used deck.Card onto the discardPile of a certain deck.Deck.
      Card drawCard()
      drawCard allows to draw a deck.Card from a cardList of a certain deck.Deck.

      Getter to obtain the cardList of a deck.Deck.
      java.util.List<Card> getDiscardPile()
      Getter to obtain the discardPile of a deck.Deck.
      boolean isEmpty()
      isEmpty allows to know if the cardList has size()==0.
      void reloadDeck()
      reloadDeck allows to add all the Cards of the discardPile to the cardList of a certain deck.Deck.

      • deckShuffle

        public void deckShuffle()
        deckSuffle allows to shuffle the cardList of a certain deck.Deck.

      • getCardList

        public java.util.List<Card> getCardList()
        Getter to obtain the cardList of a deck.Deck.
        Returns:
        cardList whence a Player can draw a deck.Card.

      • getDiscardPile

        public java.util.List<Card> getDiscardPile()
        Getter to obtain the discardPile of a deck.Deck.
        Returns:
        cardList where a Player can discard a used deck.Card.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        isEmpty allows to know if the cardList has size()==0.
        Returns:
        true (if a list of deck.Card is empty), false (otherwise).

      • drawCard

        public Card drawCard()
        drawCard allows to draw a deck.Card from a cardList of a certain deck.Deck.
        Returns:
        drawnCard that is the deck.Card has just drawn.

      • discardCard

        public void discardCard​(Card card)
        discardCard allows to put a used deck.Card onto the discardPile of a certain deck.Deck.
        Parameters:
        card - that is the deck.Card has just discarded.

      • reloadDeck

        public void reloadDeck()
        reloadDeck allows to add all the Cards of the discardPile to the cardList of a certain deck.Deck. Then it shuffles cardList.
